attributes.action: Let children in all schools all over the UK have a longer summer holidays.
attributes.additional_details: I think teachers would also love this too as they would also like to spend more time relaxing with their loved ones in summer.
attributes.background: Give children all across the UK a longer summer holidays to be able to spend more time with their loved ones. I think we should let children have all of July off as it is summer as well as August which we already have off.
